articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Bulgarian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Bulgarian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Bulgarian Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Georgi Peychinov at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday. 
					 On hand were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the Bulgarian embassy here.
					
					  After receiving the credentials, the president had a conversation with the ambassador.

articles.title: Reception Given at Syrian Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given at Syrian Embassy
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Charge d' Affaires a.i. of Syria here Salah Soukkar arranged a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Tuesday on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the day of independence of his country.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade who is chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Thae Jong, vice-department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Salah Soukkar in his speech made at the reception said that Kim Il Sung always lives not only in the hearts of the Korean people but of all other people of the world struggling for freedom and independence.
					
					He noted that the friendly relations between Syria and the DPRK provided by Hafez al-Assad and Kim Il Sung are growing stronger under the deep care of President Bashar al-Assad and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Many achievements have been made in the development of the bilateral relations under the guidance of the top leaders of the two countries and the Syrian people have struggled to defend the country's sovereignty, consolidate the national independence and achieve the Arab unity, the regional peace and security, he added.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech said that Kim Il Sung is not only the father of socialist Korea but an eternal sun of mankind as he dedicated all his life to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and the cause of global independence, adding that the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The Korean people are extending invariable support and solidarity to the Syrian people's just cause of the struggle to firmly protect the dignity of the nation, seek a fair and comprehensive settlement of the Middle East problem under the leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party, he said, expressing the hope that the friendly Syrian people would register greater success in their efforts to accomplish the cause of achieving country's progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on April 21 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and others.
					
					 Morteza Moradian said in his speech that the President led the arduous revolutionary struggle against outside forces to victory and handed down to the Korean people the independent and prosperous country as a legacy.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful nation in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of the President.
					
					 The friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK provided by the great leaders of the two countries are growing stronger in various fields including politics, economy and culture, he said, adding:
					
					 The Islamic Republic of Iran has positively supported the Korean people's struggle to ensure global peace and security and achieve the country's reunification.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that it is an expression of profound reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il that the Iranian friends are joining the Korean people in commemorating their significant holidays.
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea and wisely led the revolution and construction, putting forward the Korean people as the most dignified and independent people, he said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of the President, has turned the country into an invincible socialist power dignified with Songun with his outstanding political caliber and seasoned leadership.
					
					 The friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran provided by the President and the high-ranking leaders of Iran are growing stronger under the deep care of the leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits U.S. Spy Ship
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits U.S. Spy Ship
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited Pueblo, U.S. imperialists' armed spy ship, Wednesday on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 After being briefed on the fact that the spy ship was captured by a self-defensive measure taken by navy of the KPA while perpetrating espionage against the DPRK after intruding deep into its territorial waters, they looked round its armory, information gathering room, deciphering room, 12.7 mm caliber machine-gun, high performance antennas and other arms and equipment and spying equipment.
					
					 At the end of the visit Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, wrote in the visitor's book that the heroic KPA fully displayed its might, always keeping itself combat ready under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The KPA commanded by General Secretary Kim Jong Il will win only victory, he noted, extending a militant salute to the servicepersons of the People's Army on its birthday.

articles.title: 24th National Scientific and Technological Festival Opens
articles.content:
24th National Scientific and Technological Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The 24th national scientific and technological festival was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Wednesday.
					 The festival brought together officials, scientists, technicians and workers who were highly praised at the local scientific and technological festivals for having presented scientific and technological successes helpful to accelerating the building of an economic power.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the festival which will last till April 28 are new products, multi-media, diagrams and others showcasing valuable achievements made in scientific researches and technical innovations in boosting the metal, electric and coal industries and railway transport, increasing the production in various fields and solving people's food problem. 
					
					 The festival will offer the opportunity of widely introducing in various forms the achievements made in the efforts to develop nation's science and technology and accelerate the technological updating of the national economy. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, O Su Yong, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Pyon Yong Rip, president of the State Academy of Sciences, scientists, technicians and workers.

articles.title: Full Scores Off Press
articles.content:
Full Scores Off Press
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Art and Literature Publishing House has recently brought out more than 10 full scores which show the development of the Juche-oriented musical art achieved under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the full scores are "Patriotic Song", the piano concerto "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", the orchestral music "General on a Galloping White Horse", "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil", "The Glow over Kangson", "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain" and "Arirang", the symphony "The Sea of Blood" and the string ensemble for pizzicato " How Wonderful This Land Is ".
					
					 They will be conducive to stepping up the development of the musical art of Juche and arousing the Korean people to efforts for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocation Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocation Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the puppet army of south Korea recently moved Marker No. 0768 of the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) in the eastern sector of the front dozens of meters close to the area of the DPRK side.
					 This serious military provocation is a wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement and a deliberate and premeditated action to escalate tension in the areas along the MDL.
					
					 The reckless provocation perpetrated at a time when the military confrontation between the north and the south has reached an extreme phase is a vicious criminal act of seriously getting on the nerves of the servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and lashing them into a great fury.
					
					 The south Korean puppet army should immediately replant the marker in the place where it used to be. 
					
					 Should it do not accept the just demand of the DPRK, the latter will take a measure for self-defence and the south Korean warmongers will be held entirely accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: KCNA Ridicules Japan's Poor Political Charade
articles.content:
KCNA Ridicules Japan's Poor Political Charade
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are busy with reckless anti-DPRK campaign, finding fault with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch.
					 The Liberal Democratic Party is becoming increasingly assertive that "the plan for attack on the base" of the DPRK should be "examined" in the wake of its call for tightening the "sanctions" against it. The government is examining the "defense program guidelines" to be rewritten after making it a fait accompli to possess an early warning satellite capable of detecting ballistic missiles. 
					
					 Senior government officials including the defense minister and the chief Cabinet secretary during their public appearances claimed that the introduction of the early warning satellite is aimed to "protect Japan's security from threat" from someone.
					
					 Japan's excessive reaction to the DPRK's activities for the development of space for peaceful purposes is jeered by the world community as it is nothing but another political charade for turning itself into a military giant and realizing its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 Japan is not entitled to take issue with other's satellite launch. It has stockpiled a huge amount of plutonium and test-fired several rockets, getting more frantic with building a missile shield.
					
					 Japan's most recently announced space plan compels others to refer again to Japan's bad habit of pulling up others.
					
					 The Strategic Headquarters for Space Development of Japan in a "basic space plan" released two days before the DPRK's satellite launch stated that it would launch 34 satellites in the five years to come along with the vicarious launch of satellite for other countries and kick off technological research into early warning satellite for the purpose of detecting ballistic missile launch. 
					
					 Japan launched 16 satellites from 2004 to 2008.
					
					 It is, therefore, a height of folly for Japan to become more vociferous than any others in misrepresenting the DPRK's launch of experimental communications satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 as a "threat."
					
					 It is Japan's assertion that satellites launched by it do not pose any problem but the one launched by others is problematic. What shameless and brigandish sophism it is.
					
					 Japan is now rebuked by the international community for its black-hearted behavior.
					
					 It avails itself of every opportunity to become a military power and realize its wild ambition for overseas aggression.
					
					 Japan is examining the performance of war means and the commanding system for the said purposes under various pretexts.
					
					 Taking the DPRK's satellite launch as a golden opportunity, Japan described it as a "missile launch" and made an overall examination of the "Self-Defense Forces'" alert posture under the pretext of "intercepting" the satellite.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the SDF tried to round off the exercises for an actual war of aggression against the DPRK under the pretext of "operation for intercepting" its satellite.
					
					 The SDF underwent a comprehensive exercise under simulated conditions of an actual war against the DPRK in all aspects ranging from the adoption of a decision to launch the war of reinvasion, issue of order, mobilization of all the people, adjustment and deployment of troops and war means to reconnaissance, detecting targets and simulation attacks.
					
					 Japan is so cunning and crafty.
					
					 But no one will agree with Japan's moves to become a military power and round off preparations for a war.
					
					 It would be beneficial for Japan to stop the poor political charade over the DPRK's satellite launch, though belatedly.

articles.title: UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Rebuked
articles.content:
UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Rebuked
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers finally took an action against the DPRK's satellite launch by abusing the UN Security Council despite the DPRK's repeated warnings. This was the most unbearable insult and unpardonable crime against the DPRK as it encroached upon its sovereignty and dignity.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The DPRK's successful satellite launch conducted according to its Juche-oriented policy for the development of outer space can never be called into question by others, the news analyst observes, and goes on:
					
					 The UNSC should have taken issue with those countries which launched more satellites than other countries first if it considers a satellite launch as a crime. But a satellite launch has never been tabled and dealt with at the UNSC. 
					
					 It is something surprising and strange that the above-mentioned double-standards are openly applied in the UN whose charter clearly lays down the principle of sovereign equality and non-interference in the internal affairs of other countries. What matters is that the UNSC plays a puppet role in handling international issues as it pleases to meet the political interests of a few specified countries.
					
					 The U.S. shuts its eyes to even violations of international law by its stooges but makes much fuss about legitimate activities conducted by independent countries. This brigandish logic of the U.S. was applied to handling the issue of the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and the UNSC fully accepted it.
					
					 Under such grave situation the only way for humankind to survive is to build its own strength and rely on it.
					
					 Big powers are gravely mistaken if they think that their high-handed and arbitrary practices will work on the DPRK and their foolish dream will come true.
					
					 The people of the DPRK will judge every matter in the interests of the country and the nation no matter what others may say and will never tolerate any act of ignoring the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Those who have pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK will be held fully accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Termed Traitor Serving Japan
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Termed Traitor Serving Japan
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) --Traitor Lee Myung Bak was recently reported to have made the disgusting remarks before the Japanese prime minister during his foreign junket that the south Korea-Japan relations "should not be allowed to retreat" due to the issue of understanding history.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes: This is, in fact, an unpardonable act of treachery as it is aimed at conniving at the Japanese reactionaries' distortion of history and covering up the shuddering crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' history of aggression and their colonial rule over Korea was the harshest and most brutal one in history. However, the Japanese reactionaries are now working with bloodshot eyes to whitewash and cover up at any cost the crimes committed by Japan in the past, refusing even to admit them and dodging apology and reparation for them.
					
					 They are becoming so shameless as to paint evil doings as good ones and an assailant as a victim. This, in essence, amounts to a prelude to reinvasion.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Lee is so keen on serving Japan that he is working hard to gloss over  the Japanese reactionaries' moves to make a retrogressive revision of history textbooks.
					
					 The successive rulers of south Korea were without exception pro-Japanese lackeys. But there has been no such wicked traitor as Lee who has perpetrated the treacherous act of covering up even the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past for the sake of "developing the relations" with Japan.
					
					 Lee is putting the five traitors of 1905 into the shade as he is acting a guide for his Japanese master in the moves to stage a comeback to Korea, kowtowing to him, bereft of even an iota of national self-respect. 
					
					 The traitor cannot escape judgment of the nation. History is sure to bring him to his grave.

articles.title: Halt to Racket of Military Confrontation Urged
articles.content:
Halt to Racket of Military Confrontation Urged
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- In order to remove the danger of a war, achieve lasting peace and realize reconciliation and unity between the north and the south, it is urgent to put an unconditional end to the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces' reckless racket of military confrontation with the DPRK, observes Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Huge armed forces are standing in acute confrontation with each other with the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) in between and distrust and hostility between the two parts of Korea have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 This is, in every sense, a natural product of the reckless ruckus of military confrontation kicked up by the U.S. keen to invade the DPRK and the south Korean warlike forces, its lackeys.
					
					 In order to achieve lasting peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula as early as possible it is imperative to put an end to the U.S. aggressive hostile policy towards the DPRK and force its aggressor forces to withdraw from south Korea without delay.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea has frantically pursued the military confrontation with the DPRK, zealously supporting the U.S. in its moves for aggression against the DPRK out of its inveterate rejection of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group has aggravated the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south as running dogs of foreign aggressor forces, utterly indifferent to the desire and destiny of the nation, and increased the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula. Unpardonable is such treacherous and anti-reunification military confrontation pursued by the group.
					
					 It was entirely just for the DPRK Foreign Ministry to have declared in a recent statement that the DPRK would boost its nuclear deterrent for self-defence in every way to cope with the increased military threat posed by the hostile forces and thus protect in a responsible manner peace and security on the Korean Peninsula with the might of Songun.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas who love the country and the nation and value peace should strongly oppose and reject the above-said racket kicked up by the above-said bellicose forces.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Confrontational Moves Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Confrontational Moves Flailed
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The gentries of the Grand National Party of south Korea on April 16 tabled "a bill on revising the law on supporting the education in unification" to the "Committee for Foreign Affairs and Trade and Unification of the National Assembly".
					 As regards this "bill" they insisted on bringing the issue of the non-governmental organizations engaged in the education in unification they claimed "encroached upon the basic order of liberal democracy" to investigation organs, etc., and stopping the financial assistance to them but rendering financial and administrative support to the members of "the organization for the education in unification" representing the stand of the "government".
					
					 This bill was reportedly referred to the "Sub-Committee for Deliberation on Bills" after its passing through the above-said committee chaired by a GNP heavyweight. 
					
					In this connection the "Consultative Council for the Education in Unification" grouping at least 90 non-governmental organizations termed the bill as an evil bill aimed at deliberately making the progressive activities for the education in unification wear down and turning the society conservative.
					
					 The organization deplored that if the bill is carried, all forms of education will be conducted to cater to the taste of the "government" and the activities of non-governmental organizations be held in check. 
					
					 The organization held that the GNP's move to revise the above-mentioned law is an extension of the moves to render the education in unification conservative which have been pushed forward in real earnest since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government".
					
					 Meanwhile, those concerned of the opposition parties were of the view that the carriage of the above-said bill would further facilitate the process of turning the education in unification conservative.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- At least 40 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a rally in Seoul on April 18 at which they denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 At the rally the organizations condemned the Lee Myung Bak "government" for persistently seeking to fully participate in the PSI under the pretext of the north's satellite launch.
					
					 The people from all walks of life branded the above-said move as a dangerous criminal act of escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the inter-Korean relations to a more extreme phase and have strongly called for an end to the move, they noted, and continued: 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee "government" is insisting on its full participation in the PSI, claiming that its move is not related to the north's satellite launch.
					
					 They charged that the present "government's" racket for sanctions against the north is a product of the policy of confrontation with the DPRK which amounts to the total denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop at once their move to take part in the PSI aimed at throwing a wet blanket over the movement for the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Elimination of Anti-Reunification Forces Called for
articles.content:
Elimination of Anti-Reunification Forces Called for
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon) made public a resolution on April 17 under the title "Let us throw overboard the anti-reunification forces with the might of the strong nation".
					 The resolution praised the north for successfully launching the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by its own efforts and with its own technology, thus demonstrating the might of the nation before the world.
					
					 Accusing the United States and the Lee Myung Bak regime of working hard to stem the trend of history toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation, the resolution said that in order to pull through this difficulty, the members of Pomchonghakryon should take the lead in the patriotic struggle for reunification and creditably fulfil their historical responsibility.
					
					 The resolution declared that the organization would wage a dynamic struggle during the "period of the movement of youth and students for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" as discussed at the 19th meeting of the co-chairmen of Pomchonghakryon.
					
					 It stressed that the organization would never pardon the Lee regime and other anti-reunification forces' policy of confrontation with compatriots and their war moves but bring earlier the day of achieving independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Greatest Man
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Greatest Man
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The vice-president of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia who visited the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun said that his visit helped him more deeply grasp the greatness of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK and the great pioneer of the human cause of independence, is enjoying boundless reverence of the Korean people and the world progressives, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Socialist Korea remains unshaken despite the worldwide economic crisis because the President laid the solid foundation for self-supporting national economy.
					
					 During my visit this time I became to know better about the undying feats of the President who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The President is, indeed, the greatest man.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the Mongolian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Mongolia in March last and various functions including a commemoration meeting are underway there, he said that in the course of such events the Mongolians deeply grasp the undying feats of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and the profound contents of the Juche idea.
					
					 Fresh successes are being achieved in Songun Korea under the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia awarded the highest order "Gold Star of Peace" to Kim Il Sung and the highest order "Star of Friendship" to Kim Jong Il representing the boundless reverence and trust of the Mongolian people in the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Bright and rosy is the future of Songun Korea as there are the army and people accelerating the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Mamadou Lamin Thiam, national permanent secretary of the Democratic Party of Senegal, issued a statement on April 7 under the title "Whole life of great man seen in numbers and eternal President of the Korean people Kim Il Sung" on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 He in his statement said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung represented the history of great devotion in which he devoted his all to building the people's country and a socialist power, praising the distinguished feats performed by him in the history of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people are now invariably holding in high esteem Kim Il Sung as the fatherly leader and eternal President as he devoted all his wisdom and energies to the independence and prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people all his life and performed the undying feats for the country and the people.
					
					 The director of the International Department of the People's Democratic Party of Uzbekistan in a statement issued on April 15 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK praised Kim Il Sung as the great revolutionary who devoted his all to the cause of the liberation and freedom of Korea and socialist construction and greatly contributed to the development of the world socialist movement and the labor movement.
					
					 He stressed that it is an expression of the boundless respect and reverence for the President that the Korean people significantly commemorate his birth anniversary every year as the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK FM's Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK FM's Statement Supported
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification jointly released a statement on April 15 in support of the statement issued by the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the UNSC issued a brigandish "presidential statement" condemning the DPRK's satellite launch.
					
					 Vehemently refuting and condemning the unjust action taken by the UNSC wantonly infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, an inviolable sovereign state, and seriously hurting the dignity of the Korean people, the statement went on:
					
					 We fully support the resolute stand of the DPRK that it will never participate in the six-party talks any longer now that the talks have turned into a platform for infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and seeking to force the DPRK to disarm itself.
					
					 We positively hail the just stand of the Korean people to bolster up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the escalated military threat from the hostile forces to intercept even the satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					 We call upon all governments, political parties and organizations of the world aspiring after peace and security on the Korean Peninsula to reject the unreasonable behavior of the UNSC and powerfully support and encourage the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and people of the DPRK in their just struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country with the might of Songun.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, was interviewed by the head of the Editorial Department of a TV Radio, on the theme of "Leader Kim Jong Il steering to victory the Korean people's drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung" on April 5 on the occasions of the April holidays of the DPRK.
					 She stressed that the DPRK's satellite launch is giving great pride, self-esteem, conviction and courage not only to the Korean people but to the world revolutionary people.
					
					 She said that the Korean people are now dynamically advancing toward a thriving nation because eternal President Kim Il Sung laid the solid foundation of socialist Korea.
					
					 She noted that Kim Jong Il has trained the Korean People's Army into the invincible army firmly prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique and led the Korean people in the drive to build an economic power while shattering the desperate moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK with his Songun revolutionary leadership true to the intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Noting that today the Korean people are waging a dynamic struggle to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012, united around Kim Jong Il in single mind, she wished them only victory at all times.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, lecture, photo exhibition and film show took place in Romania, Uganda and Guinea on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission in the period between April 7 and 10.
					 On display in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the theme of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania who is chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, at the round-table talks said that Kim Il Sung is father of socialist Korea as he liberated the country and brilliantly realized the causes of founding the party, the country and the army.
					
					 He noted that the sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea have been defended more firmly thanks to Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Malik Souma, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, in the lecture stressed that the important characteristics of the leadership method of Kim Jong Il is to keep a firm hold on ideology and settle all problems by dint of ideology.
					
					 A Korean film "International Friendship Exhibition House" was seen at the film show.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the lecture held in Guinea.
					
					 Meanwhile, opening ceremonies of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held in Konakov City of Tveri Region, Irkutsk City of Irkutsk Region and Artyom City of Maritime Territory of Russia in the period between April 7 and 11 on the occasion of the April holidays.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Germany on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in realizing the cause of national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. And it indicates the tasks and ways for realizing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the three charters.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador bulgaro
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador bulgaro
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- Georgi Peychinov presento este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Bulgaria en Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y los miembros de la embajada bulgara en Corea.
					
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Inaugurado el 24o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
articles.content:
Inaugurado el 24o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 22 en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones el 24o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas.
					  En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores que han sido evaluados en los festivales locales por sus exitos cientificos y tecnicos que contribuyeron a acelerar la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					  Se presentaron en la presente edicion los nuevos productos, multimedias y materiales graficos que demuestran los valiosos exitos de investigacion e innovacion tecnica logrados en revitalizar la industria metalurgica, la electrica, la hullera y el transporte ferroviario, aumentar la produccion en varias ramas y resolver el problema alimentario del pueblo.
					
					  A traves de este festival, que tendra lugar del dia 22 al 28, seran divulgados ampliamente de diversas maneras los exitos alcanzados en las labores para desarrollar las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y acelerar la reconstruccion tecnica de la economia nacional.
					
					  En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, el ministro de Educacion Kim Yong Jin, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias Pyon Yong Rip, cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores.

articles.title: Ejercito titere surcoreano comete provocacion militar en el frente
articles.content:
Ejercito titere surcoreano comete provocacion militar en el frente
  Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- Recientemente, los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano cometieron la grave provocacion militar de remover a decenas de metros hacia el interior de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el marcador no. 0768 de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar en la zona oriental del frente.
					 Esta premeditada maniobra viola flagrantemente el Acuerdo de Armisticio y tiene por su objetivo agravar la ya tensa situacion de la zona de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					 Esta imprudente provocacion, que se reporto cuando llega al punto limite la confrontacion militar entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, es un brutal acto criminal que irrita e indigna mucho a los uniformados del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 El ejercito titere surcoreano debe colocar inmediatamente en su lugar ese marcador removido a la zona de la RPDC.
					
					 Si no es aceptada nuestra justa demanda, tomaremos una medida para la autodefensa y todas las consecuencias, que emanen de ella, recaeran enteramente sobre los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano que fabricaron el presente caso.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el drama politico anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el drama politico anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, los reaccionarios japoneses libran demencialmente la campana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial realizado legitimamente por ella.
					  Despues de la adopcion de las medidas de "sancion" contra la RPDC, flota la opinion de que "se debe revisar el ataque a la base" coreana en el seno del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon y el gobierno japones examina la "guia del programa de defensa" en el proceso de enmienda tomando por hecho consumado la posesion del satelite de alerta previa para detectar el misil balistico.
					
					  El ministro de Defensa, el director del secretariado del gabinete y otras figuras del gobierno japones describen oficialmente como si la introduccion de tal satelite se necesitara para "preservar la seguridad de Japon" desde la "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					  Tal reaccion  excesiva de Japon a las actividades cosmicas de la RPDC para fines pacificos es ridiculizada por todo el mundo constituyendo otro drama politico para realizar la conversion de Japon en una potencia militar y su ambicion de retomar el camino de agresion.
					
					  Ese pais isleno no tiene derecho ni cara para hablar del lanzamiento de satelite artificial de alguien.
					
					  El deposita una gran cantidad de plutonio, realizo en varias ocasiones la prueba de lanzamiento del cohete y se entrega ahora mas locamente al establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil.
					
					  El recien publicado plan espacial de Japon hace recordar una vez mas el cronico vicio de este pais de acusar a otros.
					
					  Dos dias antes del lanzamiento del satelite coreano, la sede estrategica para el desarrollo del cosmos de Japon hizo publico el "plan principal del cosmos" que propone lanzar dentro 5 anos futuros 34 satelites incluyendo los para otros paises  y, al mismo tiempo, iniciar la investigacion de las tecnicas del satelite de alerta previa para detectar el lanzamiento de misil balistico.
					
					  Japon lanzo 16 satelites durante 5 anos desde 2004 a 2008.
					
					  Por tanto, resulta muy ridiculo el avieso comportamiento de Japon que considera como "amenaza" el lanzamiento del satelite piloto de comunicaciones "Kwangmyongsong No.2" por parte de la RPDC.
					
					  Cuan descarada y bandidesca es la sofisteria de Japon de que no hay problema en el lanzamiento de sus satelites y si lo hay en el caso de otros paises.
					
					  Tal comportamiento siniestro de Japon causa la antipatia de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Japon no pierde ninguna oportunidad para realizar la conversion de si mismo en una potencia militar y su ambicion de agredir a ultramar.
					
					  En este sentido, este pais llego utilizando todos los pretextos hasta la etapa de revision de la eficiencia de equipos y el sistema de mando.
					
					  Aprovechando el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC como mejor oportunidad, ese pais isleno lo califico de "lanzamiento de misil" y bajo el pretexto de interceptarlo chequeo generalmente el estado de movilizacion de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa".
					
					  Lo mas grave es que bajo el pretexto de la "operacion de interceptacion" del satelite coreano, esas fuerzas armadas trataron de completar el ejercicio practico para la nueva agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  Esta vez, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" pusieron en funcionamiento general todos los procesos desde la toma de la decision de la provocacion de la guerra de nueva agresion contra la RPDC, la transmision de las ordenes, la movilizacion de todo el pueblo, el control y emplazamiento de los efectivos y equipos hasta la exploracion, la captacion de blancos y el simulacro de ataque, etc.  
					
					  Asi es tan grande la astucia de Japon.
					
					  Pero, nadie sera enganado por tales acciones taimadas de Japon.
					
					  Sera bueno para Japon bajar, aunque sea ahora, el telon de ese pueril drama politico iniciado bajo el pretexto del lanzamiento de satelite artificial por parte de la RPDC.
